mapper.insert: insert into car (car_id, car_name, placeoforigin, line_id, car_productiondate, car_bugdate, car_remark) values (#{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeoforigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carProductiondate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carBugdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update car set car_name = #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, placeoforigin = #{placeoforigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_productiondate = #{carProductiondate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_bugdate = #{carBugdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_remark = #{carRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select car_id, car_name, placeoforigin, line_id, car_productiondate, car_bugdate, car_remark from car where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select car_id, car_name, placeoforigin, line_id, car_productiondate, car_bugdate, car_remark from car
